Genevive Taylor

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Genevieve
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Elmer E and Agnes M Johnson
  4. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE
  5. Sending Organization: n/a
  6. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 6
  8. Date of Birth: 1921-09-12, Groveland, NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Genevive Kimble
  11. Spouse Name: Gerald Kimble
  12. Notes: Sources differ on sending institution: Home Finding Society, Children's Aid Society, and N.Y. Children's Welfare all listed. Genevive's first husband - Elmer V. Roeder.
  13. Source: Holdrege newspaper (unidentified), 1927; National Orphan Train Complex; OTR 466; OTR 465; Archives DB-Clients.
